member.name: IMFSequencerSource.AppendTopology
member.summary: Adds a topology to the end of the queue.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the topology. This pointer cannot be NULL. If an application passes NULL, the call fails with an E_INVALIDARG error code.
A combination of flags from the enumeration.
Receives the sequencer element identifier for this topology.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description:
The source topology node is missing one of the following attributes:
MF_TOPONODE_STREAM_DESCRIPTOR
MF_TOPONODE_PRESENTATION_DESCRIPTOR
MF_TOPONODE_SOURCE

member.name: IMFSequencerSource.DeleteTopology
member.summary: Deletes a topology from the queue.
member.param: The sequencer element identifier of the topology to delete.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSequencerSource.GetPresentationContext
member.summary: Maps a presentation descriptor to its associated sequencer element identifier and the topology it represents.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the presentation descriptor.
Receives the sequencer element identifier. This value is assigned by the sequencer source when the application calls . This parameter is optional and can be NULL.

Receives a pointer to the interface of the original topology that the application added to the sequencer source. The caller must release the interface. This parameter can receive the value NULL if the sequencer source has switched to the next presentation. This parameter is optional and can be NULL.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The presentation descriptor is not valid.

member.name: IMFSequencerSource.UpdateTopology
member.summary: Updates a topology in the queue.
member.param: Sequencer element identifier of the topology to update.
Pointer to the interface of the updated topology object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sequencer source has been shut down.

member.name: IMFSequencerSource.UpdateTopologyFlags
member.summary: Updates the flags for a topology in the queue.
member.param: Sequencer element identifier of the topology to update.
Bitwise OR of flags from the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSequencerSource
member.summary: Implemented by the Sequencer Source. The sequencer source enables an application to create a sequence of topologies. To create the sequencer source, call . For step-by-step instructions about how to create a playlist, see How to Create a Playlist.
